title: Is the SAT Math Level 1 hard? - Quora

response.answer_text: Mathematically the SAT MATH level 1 is very easy , BUT it requires a high level of accuracy and precision to score good in the test as there is not much scope for leaving or getting an answer if you wish to get a perfect score in it. However, not many colleges give weightage to it. The colleges consider the score of SAT Math level 2 to be better for college applications as the topics covered in the SAT Math level 1 are considered to be very easy and unchallenging for a college applicant
No, it's not hard but needs a lot of your concentration you would have to solve every question logically so in particular, if you've got a good IQ you'll be able to score good marks.
